short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minions Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Minions background. Cute Minions wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a different Minions wallpaper.
2. Choose or randomize your Minions background via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Quick links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick navigation to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Direct link to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel customization for faster website access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Direct link to explore more themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. One-click wallpaper downloading.
14. Immediate access to games.
15. Activate animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Minions tab.
